item.title: Kamla coming to PS5, Switch on October 30
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch

Currently available for PC, iOS, and Android.

Soft Source Publishing and developer Mad Mantra will release horror game Kamla for PlayStation 5 and Switch on October 30, the companies announced.

Kamla first launched for PC via Steam on May 7, 2024, followed by iOS and Android on February 8, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Soft Source Publishing:

About

Find a way out of an old mansion as a priest, you have been tasked to exorcise a woman who has been possessed. Solve puzzles and complete objectives to cure her demonic possession in this experience.

Set in 1980’s India, Kamla was recently married into a rich family with a mansion full of mysteries to uncover and stories to unfold.

Just a year later she has lost her sanity and killed people in the family and is now waiting for help.

Kamla

After losing her sanity because of the demonic possession, Kamla has already killed few people and now haunts the mansion walking around, you must find her and help her.

The Ritual

You are an Indian priest with prowess in black magic, also known as a “Tantrik.” You must find objects required in your recipe to exorcise Kamla near the holy fire, These recipe items have unique values and are scattered around the house in different ways. some easy to get and some hidden behind obstacles and puzzles.

Key Features

  • Solve puzzles to clear obstacles and unlock items.
  • Evade Kamla when she is angry, find places to hide and dont lose collected items!
  • Collect these items in the holy fire and say the final prayer to finish the exorcism.

Kamla provides a tense atmophospheric thrill for the ones who love a little scare, we hope you get in there and fix Kamla as soon as possible!

item.title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake details Dragon Quest I new scenarios, encounters, and dungeons
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Meet Rubiss and Dream-Whisperer.

Publisher and developer Square Enix, and developer Artdink Corporation have released new information and screenshots for Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake introducing some of Dragon Quest I‘s new scenarios, new encounters, and new dungeons.

Get the details below.

■ Numerous Scenarios That Connect to the Overall Erdrick Trilogy Have Been Added! Confront the Darkness by Borrowing the Powers of Rubiss!

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake features numerous added scenarios that deepen the connection within the Erdrick Trilogy. In Dragon Quest I, to save the world shrouded in darkness, you’ll seek the aid of Rubiss, who also appears in Dragon Quest III. Visit the faeries, said to have a deep connection with Rubiss, and aim to summon her!

Rubiss (voiced by Kelly Hotten in English, Natsuki Kimura in Japanese)

The great spirit said to have created Alefgard. Bestows a message so the world may be saved.

Dream-Whisperer (voiced by Yuriri Naka in English, Ayumi Tsunematsu in Japanese)

The leader of the faeries. She is attempting to summon Rubiss back to this world.

—In a dream, a mysterious voice asks you to summon Rubiss, leading you to travel across the land in search of clues.

—Rubiss is said to have created the land of Alefgard. It seems she has gone far away and is no longer in this world.

—Only the Dream-Whisperer, the leader of the faeries, seems to know how to summon Rubiss. However, she has gone missing.

—The Faerie Village, where the faeries with a deep connection to Rubiss reside. Many faeries are wary of humans, so it seems necessary to earn their trust.

■ More New Encounters Await, Allowing You to Enjoy the Story of Dragon Quest I Even More Deeply!

Encounters with people not featured in the original title and new events have been added, further deepening the story of Dragon Quest I. Solve various mysteries while listening to the tales of those you encounter on your adventure.

—The protagonist encounters Tantegel’s soldiers during the journey. It seems some kind of trouble is brewing…

—To help those suffering from illness, you may also visit the mage who studies keys.

—Beyond the rugged path lies a cave inhabited by dwarves! The dwarves seem quite confident in their strength.

■ New Dungeons and Formidable Foes Have Been Added for a More Dynamic Adventure!

New dungeons and formidable foes await, bringing many changes to Alefgard where the protagonist journeys! Explore every corner of the fields and dungeons in search of unseen worlds!

—Multiple new dungeons have appeared! What exactly awaits at the end of these dungeons?

—By investigating the sparkly spot, you’ll discover items imbued with the power of nature! What happens when you gather these special ingredients scattered across the world…?

—Monsters have appeared in towns around the world. Among them are some formidable foes. Use your innate courage to rescue the people struggling from these monsters!

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on October 30. Read more about the game here, here, here, and here.

item.title: Invincible VS adds Cecil Stedman
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Don't let the suit fool you.

Cecil Stedman will be a playable character in three-versus-three tag fighting game Invincible VS, publisher Skybound Games and developer Quarter Up announced. A closed alpha test will be held later in 2025, with sign-ups now available.

Here is his character description:

A fan-favorite from the Invincible TV series and comic books, Cecil has been one of the most requested playable characters. Most often heard as a voice in Mark’s earpiece, Cecil enters the fight in Invincible VS with specialized weapons, including plasma pistols, projectile launchers and grenades to keep opponents at a distance. His ranged gameplay style is paired with tactical combat, allowing him to play cat and mouse with enemies. Want more? Cecil can also summon a limitless supply of Reanimen for backup; with access to The Hammer—a massive orbital laser—he is a devastating force on the battlefield.

Invincible VS is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store in 2026
